mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.file_step AS "fileStep", a.uid AS "uid", a.url AS "url", a.name AS "name", a.size AS "size", a.suffix AS "suffix", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
mapper.select:

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_attachment( id, type, file_step, uid, url, name, size, suffix, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{fileStep}, #{uid}, #{url}, #{name}, #{size}, #{suffix}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_attachment SET type = #{type}, file_step = #{fileStep}, uid = #{uid}, url = #{url}, name = #{name}, size = #{size}, suffix = #{suffix}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
